title: ImTOO DVD Ripper Platinum 5-keygen incl
description:
ImTOO DVD Ripper Platinum 5.0.42.0820



ImTOO DVD Ripper Platinum, the most powerful DVD rip software to convert 
DVD movie with great DVD ripping quality, is the BEST DVD converter to convert 
DVD to all video/audio files, e.g. convert DVD to MPEG, convert DVD to VCD, and 
convert audio from DVD in the fastest DVD ripping speed. ImTOO DVD Ripper 
Platinum: rip DVD movie to PSP, rip DVD to iPod. 


* ImTOO DVD Ripper Platinum, the most powerful DVD converter, can rip DVD to 
  all video/audio files like convert DVD to MPEG, AVI, WMV, DivX, MP4, H.264, 
  RM, MOV, M4V, XviD, 3GP, MP3, WMA, WAV, RA, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG, etc. in the 
  fastest DVD ripping speed and best quality. 
* No other DVD rip software supports so rich video/audio formats like ImTOO DVD 
  ripper, which can clip and merge DVD&#039;s any segment, set divers output formats 
  from one concurrently, select target subtitle and audio track. So easy to use 
  that just a few clicks are enough to convert DVD! 
* This DVD ripper can directly convert DVD to video/audio files playable on 
  many digital devices like PSP, PS3, iPod, Apple TV, iPhone, iRiver PMP, 
  Archos, Creative Zen, mobile phone, etc. 


New Functions in Version 5.0:
* The V5.0 can clip any segment to rip from DVD and merge several segments
  into one. 
* The V5.0 supports concurrently choosing divers formats as outputting to 
  rip further from one original for different multimedia devices applications. 
* Offer a Bitrate calculator tool to customize output file size. 


Key Functions:
* DVD converter 
  Convert DVD to MPEG, DVD to AVI, DVD to VCD, WMV, DivX, MP4, 
  H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, RM, MOV, M4V, XviD, 3GP, VOB, FLV, SWF, etc. 
* DVD Audio converter 
  Rip and convert DVD to MP3, WMA, WAV, RA, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG, AU, MP2, etc. 
* Convert DVD to Videos/Audios playable on Players 
  Convert DVD to video and audio formats playable on many digital devices like 
  iPod, iPhone, Apple TV, PSP, PS3, iRiver PMP, Archos, Creative Zen, mobile 
  phone, etc. 


Key Features:
* Clip any segment you want to rip from DVD, and merge several segments into 
  one if necessary. NEW 
* Concurrently choose multiple formats as outputting to rip further from one 
  original for different multimedia devices applications. NEW 
* Customize output file size using the powerful Bitrate Calculator tool. NEW 
* Detailed audio and video settings are provided in this DVD Rip software for 
  you to adjust, such as quality level, sample rate, channel and split mode. 
* Super fast DVD ripping speed provided as ImTOO DVD Ripper Platinum full 
  supports Intel Dual-Core Processor and AMD Athlon 64 X 2 Dual-Core Processor 
  which ensures full use of your CPU. 
* Multi-threading, batch conversion are supported thus the more files you 
  convert simultaneously, the faster ImTOO DVD Ripper Platinum works than other 
  DVD rip software. 
* You may choose to retrieve DVD info from the internet automatically or 
  manually. 
* So easy to use that only a few clicks are enough: all properties, settings 
  displayed in the interface are easy to handle to convert DVD movie. 
* Preview supported: you can preview the source DVD and clipped video segment 
  with zoom, subtitle, audio track etc. selectable. 
* All encoders/decoders are built in: you can convert DVD movie to all 
  supported formats once downloading the DVD rip software. 
* Sound normalization is supported to set volume for output files as you wish. 
* Auto-splits output file to several files to fit CD-R or other device. 
* High level customization: you can add any optimized profiles to the DVD 
  converter by setting output properties for specific player and clicking 
  "Save as" button. 
* Excellent image and luxuriant sound are provided.
